title: Monospace font used in book Shooting Space by Elias Redstone
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Unknown2_5034.jpg)

What is the monospace font being used here?

Thank you

Font: 

 Atlas Typewriter 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114102/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Jai_S

comments.content: The image quality is not very helpful, but a manually compressed **[Atlas Typewriter (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114102/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=CommercialType%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Atlas%20Typewriter%20-%20Medium&fid=7115fed1d940251855ba8672d0c355be&fsize=36&text=Untitled%2C%202005-6%20The%20New%20York%20Times%20Building%20(Renzo%20Piano)%20Workshop&wrap=2)** by Commercial Type looks fairly close

You might want to contact Carvalho Bernau.  
 [http://carvalho-bernau.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114102/http:/carvalho-bernau.com/ "http://carvalho-bernau.com/")

They designed Atlas Typewriter and the book.
